naslov: Villa for rent with sea view*** (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Rogoznica Vila s pogledom na more i grijanim bazenom prostire se na unutarnjoj površini od 130 m² i vanjskoj površini od 550 m, prostire se na dvije etaže i ima 3 spavaće sobe, 2 kupaonice, 1 wc, bazen, te je pogodan za smještaj 7 gostiju. U prizemlju se nalazi veliki dnevni boravak, blagovaonica, WC i kuhinja s blagim osvjetljenjem koji stvaraju privlačan i ugodan prostor. Osim prostranog rasporeda, ova ljupka vila ima velike prozore i klizna vrata koja pružaju besprijekornu vezu s vanjskim prostorom i osiguravaju obilje prirodnog svjetla. Kuhinja je kompletno opremljena sa svime što vam treba kao što su: kuhalo za vodu, blender, perilica suđa, hladnjak sa hladnom vodom i kockicama leda, aparat za kavu i ima puno prostora za odlaganje. Također ima mali drveni otok i tri visoke stolice. Odmah do kuhinje je blagovaonica s izlazom na terasu s pogledom na bazen i more. Blagovaonica je povezana sa svijetlim dnevnim boravkom s velikom baršunastom sofom, modernim dizajnerskim stolom i LED SMART SAT TV-om. Unutarnje stepenice vode na kat gdje se nalaze tri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice i prostor za čitanje. Vila je u potpunosti klimatizirana i ima pristup internetu. Tu je i vanjski parking za nekoliko automobila. Dostupno za mjesecni najam od 01.11.2024., raspolozivo za najam do 01.06.2025. Cijena 1.900 Eur/a uz sigurnosni depozit te rezijske troskove prema potrosnji. Agencijska provizija jedna mjesecna najamnina+PDV. Za vise detalja molimo kontaktirati agenciju Agencija Ketrin Real Estate info: 095 85 22 300, 095 523 17 88 WhatsApp, Viber, Skype mail: operations@ketrinrealestate.com ___________________________________________________________________ Rogoznica villa with sea view and heated pool covers an indoor area of 130 m² and outdoor area of 550 m, spreads over two floors and has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 toilet, pool, and is suitable accommodation for 7 guests. The ground floor features large open plan living, dining, toilet and kitchen area with colors and soft lightening create an inviting and welcoming space. Aside from its spacious layout, this lovely villa has large windows and sliding doors that provide a seamless connection to the outdoors and assure plenty of natural light. Kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need such as: electric kettle, blender, dishwasher, fridge with cold water and ice cubes,coffe machine and has a lots of storage space. Also features small wood island and three high chairs. Right next to the kitchen is dining area with exit to terrace overlooking the pool and sea. Dining area is connected with bright living room with a large velvet sofa, a modern designer table, and LED SMART satellite TV. The internal staircase lead to the first floor where are a three bedroom, two bathroom and space for reading. Villa is fully air-conditioned and has Internet access. There is also outdoor parking space for several cars. Monthly rent 1.900 Euro, security deposit mandatory, utilities per consumption. Available for rent from November, 1 2024 until  1, June 2025. Agency fee in amount of one monthly rent + VAT For more details kindly call agency Agencija Ketrin Real Estate info: 095 85 22 300, 095 523 17 88 WhatsApp, Viber, Skype mail: operations@ketrinrealestate.com
